name: KEEP RUNNING (itch) (Sema Studio)
description:
THIS IS A 2D GAME THAT IS IN FULL DEVELOPMENT, IT IS ABOUT A CHILD WHO MUST RUN AWAY AND FACE THE VARIOUS ENEMIES THAT ARE ALL OVER THE MAP, THIS LITTLE GAME IS DIVIDED INTO 3 LEVELS.

COMING SOON:

✓ MORE MAPS

✓MORE ENEMIES

✓CHARACTER SELECTOR

✓OTHER FUNCTIONS

I HOPE YOU LIKE IT!!!
